name: Primary Care
description: We provide primary care services for children, adults, and elderly patients. Services include: - Continuity and urgent care for all ages - Well child Care - Family planning - Prenatal care - Chronic disease management - Mental Health Services - Pharmacy consultation - Nurse case management - Nutrition consultation - Social Services - Psychosocial services - Podiatry services - Dental services
